FuncDef:
The bas-interface-name command sets the name of the BAS interface.
The undo bas-interface-name command restores the default setting.
By default, the name of the BAS interface is null.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the BAS interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The bas-interface-name command is only used to set the BAS interface name and has no special function.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
